newsitem.title: BANGLADESH: Dhaka bourse gets international affiliation.
newsitem.headline: Dhaka bourse gets international affiliation.

text.p: The Paris-based International Federation of Stock Exchanges has affiliated the Dhaka Stock Exchange (DSE), a DSE statement said on Wednesday.
It said the affiliation was the outcome of the "recent quality performance" of the DSE. The DSE is expecting full membership of the federation in the next few years, the statement added.
